body.p:
To his Excellency
Governor Bramlette
of Kentucky

The undersigned Robert S. Taylor a free person of color respectfully rerpesents that he was born in Lexington Fayette Co Kentucky resided there in the family of his parents John & Charlotte Taylor until Sept.. 1862 and removed to the city of Springfield in Clark County Ohio on or about the 1st" day of October AD 1862

His Father has since deceased and his Mother still resides in said City of Lexington Ky. His Father left Real Estate in said city, to which a part this applicant is an heir And he is desirous of returning to said place (viz Lexington) for the purpose of settling up his said Fathers estate & disposing of his (Applicants) interest therein
He therefore solicits from your Excellency such a permit or pass as will enable him to accomplish said purpose with security and as in duty bound will

State of Ohio
Clark County
City of Springfield

This is to
over
certify that I am acquainted with the within named Robert S. Taylor and believe the statements of the within application to be true and that his request is deserving of the consideration of the proper authorities
Applicants age is Thirty Years -- Married -- of light color -- Black Hair, Greyish Eyes and Five feet Ten & 3/4 inches high

Attest
My hand & official seal on this 15th day of January in the year A.D. 1864
James J. Snyder
Mayor of the
City of Springfied O
